long_description: Made for adventure travelers and minimalist backpackers, the Bug Hut Pro 2 is a 2-person shelter that protects against flying insects-and now it offers extra protection from those critters! EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Gear repels mosquitoes, ticks, flies, and fleas. Invisible built-in Insect Shield(R) repellent remains effective through 6 months of exposure to weathering or through 25 launderings for washable items; do not dry clean. This full-coverage mesh tent with coated nylon taffeta floor and a large door offers complete enclosure with a taut, stable and resilient design. Freestanding design uses 2 equal-length aluminum poles and pole sleeves for easy set-up. Includes 4 aluminum stakes and pole and stake bags. No special care or storage required.
short_description: Made for adventure travelers and minimalist backpackers, the Bug Hut Pro 2 is a 2-person shelter that protects against flying insects-and now it offers extra protection from those critters!
